title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
description: When nineteen-year-old huntress Feyre kills a wolf in the woods, a terrifying creature demands retribution. Taken to the fae lands of Prythian, she finds herself entangled in a court of masks, curses, and a dangerous love that could destroy both worlds.

title: A Court of Mist and Fury
description: After surviving Amarantha’s clutches, Feyre returns to the Spring Court but is haunted by memories and bargains made with the High Lord of Night. As she navigates newfound power and passion, she must decide who she truly is and what she’s willing to fight for.

title: A Court of Wings and Ruin
description: War looms over Prythian as Feyre returns to the Spring Court to gather information on the invading king. Loyalties are tested and love endures amid alliances and betrayals that will decide the fate of humans and fae alike.

title: A Court of Frost and Starlight
description: Set between wars and new beginnings, Feyre and Rhysand adjust to peace in the Night Court as their family heals and prepares for the future during the Winter Solstice.

title: A Court of Silver Flames
description: Nesta Archeron battles inner demons and newfound powers as she trains with Cassian, the Illyrian warrior who refuses to give up on her. Together they confront trauma, redemption, and a fire that could consume them both.

title: Throne of Glass
description: Assassin Celaena Sardothien is offered freedom if she wins a deadly competition to become the king’s champion. But dark forces within the castle hint that her destiny is far greater than anyone imagines.

title: Crown of Midnight
description: As the king’s champion, Celaena uncovers the corruption of the empire she serves while wrestling with her loyalty, her heart, and the shadows of her past.

title: Heir of Fire
description: Fleeing grief and betrayal, Celaena journeys to a distant land to master her magic under the watchful eye of a mysterious warrior who pushes her to her limits.

title: Queen of Shadows
description: Returning to Rifthold, Celaena—now Aelin—embraces her true identity as she seeks revenge, freedom, and the courage to face her destiny as queen.

title: Empire of Storms
description: Aelin’s allies gather as war brews across Erilea. Magic, power, and love intertwine in a desperate attempt to save the realm from darkness.

title: Tower of Dawn
description: While Aelin fights elsewhere, Chaol and Nesryn travel to the southern continent seeking allies and healing, uncovering dark secrets that could change everything.

title: Kingdom of Ash
description: In the explosive finale of the Throne of Glass series, Aelin is imprisoned in an iron coffin while her friends rally kingdoms to wage one last battle for freedom.

title: House of Earth and Blood
description: Half-fae Bryce Quinlan seeks revenge for the murder of her closest friends, but when a fallen angel becomes her unlikely partner, they uncover a conspiracy threatening all of Crescent City.

title: House of Sky and Breath
description: Bryce and Hunt navigate political unrest and forbidden love as a rebellion brews in Crescent City, forcing them to choose between their freedom and the fate of their world.

title: House of Flame and Shadow
description: In the latest Crescent City installment, Bryce is stranded in a new world as Hunt faces captivity. Both must confront ancient powers and find a way back to each other before everything burns.

title: Fourth Wing
description: Violet Sorrengail is forced to enter Basgiath War College, where cadets must bond with dragons or die trying. Small, fragile, and brilliant, Violet must outsmart brutal trials and a rival who may be her greatest threat—or her destiny.

title: Iron Flame
description: In the sequel to Fourth Wing, Violet faces an even deadlier second year at Basgiath, uncovering dark secrets about the war, the riders, and her own power as loyalties fracture and love deepens amid danger.

title: Onyx Storm
description: The third Empyrean novel continues Violet’s fight to protect dragons and riders as new alliances form and a cataclysmic threat rises, testing love and loyalty to their limits.

title: Quicksilver
description: In a near-future world where magic is energy, a reclusive engineer guarding dangerous secrets crosses paths with an optimistic courier, igniting an adventure of discovery, redemption, and slow-burn affection that could change their city forever.

title: The Spellshop
description: After losing her job as a royal librarian, Kiela retreats to a seaside cottage filled with mischievous magical creatures. When a charming spell-seller stumbles into her quiet life, she must decide whether to open her heart and rekindle her magic.

title: Caraval
description: Scarlett has long dreamed of attending Caraval, a legendary game where magic blurs reality. When her sister disappears into the performance, Scarlett must navigate dazzling illusions and a dangerously handsome stranger to uncover the truth.

title: The Awakening
description: When twins Tory and Darcy Vega discover they are Fae, they’re thrust into Zodiac Academy—a brutal magical school ruled by elemental heirs who see them as rivals. Power, attraction, and danger collide in this dark, addictive romantasy saga.

title: From Blood and Ash
description: Chosen from birth to usher in a new era, Poppy’s life is controlled until a golden-eyed guard named Hawke makes her question everything. As kingdoms tremble, passion and prophecy entwine in this addictive high-fantasy romance.
